statement.p: In 31.82 of the last 44 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{44}}={0.3182}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{44}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3182}\cdot{44}={14.0008}. We round that as requested to 14 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
